places_with_reviews.name: C.R. Regency
address: No. 27/1 By Pass Road,n Vellore District, opposite Indira Nagar, Krishnapuram, Ambur, Tamil Nadu 635802, India

reviews.text:
Possibly one of the very few hotels in Ambur. The rooms are decent for a short business stay. They have single, double, and triple beds rooms.

No meals are served here however, you have few good restaurants around such as Sai Sangeet which is a good south Indian veg pick for your breakfast.

The hotel is located above a hospital so the parking sometimes might not very easy to get.

This is just a budget hotel, so don't expect a star service. It's decent and definitely a good choice.

It was all good experience
Staff behaviour was fantastic.
Very cordial and helping staff
Definitely a good one for this budget. Rooms are spacious and nearby a vegetarian hotel. Eventhough the rooms are not brand new, One an consider without hesitation.

This hotel in Ambur is ok kind. I had to visit the city and stay for a night. The city has no five star hotels. Based on the reviews I stayed here. The Beds and blankets were not clean. They should maintain hygiene. Bathroom was leaking, ac was running but makes a blast sound every 30 minutes or so. The staff were helpful.

We checked in around 2.30PM on Sunday the 1st May 2022. We have allotted a Room on the fourth floor. No doubt the room was kept clean and tidy. But, unfortunately, drinking water is not provided, Intercom was not working, news paper not provided in the morning, TV not working, though there are 20 plus rooms, parking space provided only for 3 cars. We have to remove some two wheelers and park our car. We just managed because the Rooms were good.

reviews.text:
I love this place... Since years
Its finger licking good .. can't wait to go back again
Small restaurant on the Ambur main road. Good varieties  of kababs both Chicken and Beef. Biriyani and Chicken kabab was too good. Decently maintained.

Once a time this shop was good at all.
Beef biriyani (basmati rice) is my all time favourite.

But nowadays they reduces their both quality and quantity of foods.., biriyani taste was below average.
Beef chilli is good in taste.
At first they provide well cooked basmati rice biriyani with softened meat, but now they use jeera rice .
When you love to  kebab then this shop will satisfy you.

price are average & worth for the quality and quantity of food.
This shop is located in highway service raod.
There was  no parking area, we park our bike in service road but no way to park car here.

Service was good and their ambiance is good enough., They have separate place to dine in with our family.
One of Ambur best kabab centre... They have plenty of choices for you can choose here... And specially green chillies and pepper chillies is best in this restaurant... Am satisfied... #foodie
